column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've been to Bavette's twice now
column3: it's really good. The second time we went
column4: we got so drunk that I would be lying if I said I remembered anything
column5: but I woke up the next morning with a swollen face/fingers and a vile hangover - only attributable to an evening of rich
column6: salty deliciousness and copious amounts of red wine.... both of which
